testcase.name: test_0001_uses where in for has many users

failure.message: --- expected +++ actual @@ -1 +1 @@ -"SELECT \\"hmt_users\\".* FROM \\"hmt_users\\" WHERE (\\"hmt_users\\".\\"id\\" IN (SELECT \\"hmt_invoices\\".\\"hmt_user_id\\" FROM \\"hmt_invoices\\" WHERE (\\"hmt_invoices\\".\\"amount\\" = 1)))" +"SELECT `hmt_users`.* FROM `hmt_users` WHERE (`hmt_users`.`id` IN (SELECT `hmt_invoices`.`hmt_user_id` FROM `hmt_invoices` WHERE (`hmt_invoices`.`amount` = 1)))"

testcase.name: test_0002_does not collapse two attributes on a has_many

failure.message: --- expected +++ actual @@ -1 +1 @@ -"SELECT \\"hmt_users\\".* FROM \\"hmt_users\\" WHERE ((\\"hmt_users\\".\\"id\\" IN (SELECT \\"hmt_invoices\\".\\"hmt_user_id\\" FROM \\"hmt_invoices\\" WHERE (\\"hmt_invoices\\".\\"amount\\" > 1))) AND (\\"hmt_users\\".\\"id\\" IN (SELECT \\"hmt_invoices\\".\\"hmt_user_id\\" FROM \\"hmt_invoices\\" WHERE (\\"hmt_invoices\\".\\"amount\\" < 10))))" +"SELECT `hmt_users`.* FROM `hmt_users` WHERE ((`hmt_users`.`id` IN (SELECT `hmt_invoices`.`hmt_user_id` FROM `hmt_invoices` WHERE (`hmt_invoices`.`amount` > 1))) AND (`hmt_users`.`id` IN (SELECT `hmt_invoices`.`hmt_user_id` FROM `hmt_invoices` WHERE (`hmt_invoices`.`amount` < 10))))"

testcase.name: test_0003_can handle deeply nested has many relationships

failure.message: --- expected +++ actual @@ -1 +1 @@ -"SELECT \\"hmt_users\\".* FROM \\"hmt_users\\" WHERE (\\"hmt_users\\".\\"id\\" IN (SELECT \\"hmt_invoices\\".\\"hmt_user_id\\" FROM \\"hmt_invoices\\" WHERE \\"hmt_invoices\\".\\"id\\" IN (SELECT \\"hmt_notes\\".\\"hmt_invoice_id\\" FROM \\"hmt_notes\\" WHERE (\\"hmt_notes\\".\\"body\\" LIKE '%foo%'))))" +"SELECT `hmt_users`.* FROM `hmt_users` WHERE (`hmt_users`.`id` IN (SELECT `hmt_invoices`.`hmt_user_id` FROM `hmt_invoices` WHERE `hmt_invoices`.`id` IN (SELECT `hmt_notes`.`hmt_invoice_id` FROM `hmt_notes` WHERE (`hmt_notes`.`body` LIKE '%foo%'))))"
